title: Bid
description: Brand Agent bid submitted in response to a ContextRequest

brand_agent_id.description: Identifier of the brand agent placing the bid

context_id.description: ID of the ContextRequest being bid on

wallet_id.description: Wallet to debit if the bid wins

pricing.description: Pricing vector for different billing events. Uses micros (authoritative), cents (brand-friendly), and dollars (display).

cpx_micros.description: Price per exposure in USD micros (1 USD = 1,000,000 micros). Authoritative value.

cpx_cents.description: Price per exposure in cents (for brand-friendly display). Derived from cpx_micros.

cpx_dollars.description: Price per exposure in dollars (for UI display). Derived from cpx_micros.

cpc_micros.description: Price per click in USD micros (1 USD = 1,000,000 micros). Authoritative value.

cpc_cents.description: Price per click in cents (for brand-friendly display). Derived from cpc_micros.

cpc_dollars.description: Price per click in dollars (for UI display). Derived from cpc_micros.

cpa_micros.description: Price per conversion in USD micros (1 USD = 1,000,000 micros). Authoritative value.

cpa_cents.description: Price per conversion in cents (for brand-friendly display). Derived from cpa_micros.

cpa_dollars.description: Price per conversion in dollars (for UI display). Derived from cpa_micros.

recommendation.description: Recommendation metadata that will be rendered to the user if the bid wins

creative_input.description: Unified creative input structure (see CreativeInput schema)

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the bid was generated

relevance.description: Relevance score for this bid (0.0-1.0). Required field used by operator for bid ranking.

preferred_format.description: Preferred creative format for this bid

processing_latency_ms.description: Round-trip latency from auction request receipt to bid submission (milliseconds). Used by operator to track brand agent response times.

creative_input.short_description: CRM built for growing teams, with AI-assisted workflows.
creative_input.long_description: Nimbus CRM Pro is designed for teams of 5-50 people who need intelligent pipeline management.
creative_input.context_snippet: For startups needing higher limits and automated expense workflows.
